backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-to-file mapping describing Valentine UI features, evasive button logic, meme reveal, and theme requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including App.tsx, index.css, and tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining theme variables and dark mode palette using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main Valentine page implementing evasive No button, Yes-triggered reveal view, meme display, and themed animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity state via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider handling Internet Identity login, storage, and status management.
frontend/src/index.css: Frontend-specific romantic pastel theme variables plus custom animations for hearts and transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry file configuring QueryClient, identity provider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending pastel color tokens, fonts, shadows, and animation utilities for the Valentine theme.
project_state.json: Tracks the projectâ€™s versioned state for building a pastel-themed Valentine React app with an evasive No button and a Yes-triggered meme reveal. Lists existing features, pending requests, and needed static assets.
